Name: Dotgeon
About the game: Dotgeon is 2D action-adventure arcade game that will allow you to feel yourself in a bright and colorful world as a creature that rebelled against the rest, ready to resist at any cost. Survive on an open map - collect resources, kill enemies and collect three columns from stone to go to the portal. Interesting mechanics of this world will not let you get bored. Break stone, kill enemies, break enemies and kill stone. But that's not all! Open chests, collect upgrades, travel across a cozy map and have fun. Help this creature free the dothgeon and go through the portal to make his seemingly impossible dream come true. But we all know that no matter what world you are in, you can do anything!
